There are no ADA-accessible 1 train stations between 96th Street and Dyckman Street

Community leaders have called on Columbia to install an elevator to make the 125th Street station more accessible.

Dyckman Street

125th Street

96th Street

72nd Street

66th Street–Lincoln Center

59th Street–Columbus Circle

Times Square–42nd Street

34th Street–Penn Station

Chambers Street

WTC Cortland

South Ferry
